description: This tool refers to the Windows Features interface within the Windows operating system. It allows users to enable or disable optional features, such as the 'Microsoft-Windows-TS-OptionalComponents-Package'. Users can access this tool by searching for 'optionalfeatures' in the Start menu, which opens the Windows Features window. From there, users can check the relevant boxes to install necessary optional components to enhance the system's functionality or address specific requirements. It is essential for system administrators to ensure that the correct features are installed as part of their patch management tasks.
